short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track minutes and reset to 0 for calls.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Call Time Tracker is a versatile Chrome extension designed to help freelancers, consultants, and anyone who bills by the minute or hour to effortlessly track the time spent on calls right from their browser. With an intuitive interface and seamless operation, managing call durations and calculating potential earnings has never been easier.

Key Features:

Time Tracking: Start and stop the timer with a single click to accurately measure call durations.
Earnings Calculation: Set your hourly rate and see your earnings calculated in real-time as the timer runs.
Rate Customization: Choose from a predefined list of hourly rates or set your own to tailor the tracker to your specific billing practices.
Reset Seconds Option: With a toggle switch, decide whether to round off to the nearest minute for each session, giving you flexibility in how you bill your time.
Dark Mode Interface: Enjoy a modern and eye-friendly interface that ensures ease of use at any time of the day.
Instant Contact: A dedicated "Contact" button links directly to WhatsApp, making client communication more accessible than ever.
Whether you're conducting scheduled calls, participating in impromptu meetings, or offering paid consultations, Call Time Tracker is the perfect tool to ensure you're accurately compensated for your time.

Easy to Use:

Click the extension icon to open the tracker.
Set your hourly rate from the dropdown menu.
Start the timer at the beginning of your call and stop it once you're done.
View your calculated earnings instantly and adjust rates as needed.
Stay on Top of Your Billing with Call Time Tracker - the essential tool for professionals who value their time and expertise.
